name: Reception Area
description: The Reception Area of PrestoCorp exudes a professional and efficient atmosphere, with polished marble floors, contemporary decor, and a sleek desk manned by a diligent receptionist. The room is well-organized, featuring a waiting area with plush leather couches and a selection of business journals. A large [portrait] of the founder and CEO greets everyone who enters the room. Access to certain areas is closely monitored through a high-tech [Keycard Terminal].
short_description: The receptionist is busy answering the phone rignt next to the [keycard terminal]. The CEOs [portrait] is right above the receptionist desk.
directions: The Reception Area is connected to the [Main Hallway] to the north, the [Financial Department] to the east, the [Parking Lot] to the south and a [Supply Closet] to the west.
